Package algonquin.cst2335.a2335finalprojectapplication

Class MovieDetailsFragment.DownloadImageTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer,​android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • algonquin.cst2335.a2335finalprojectapplication.MovieDetailsFragment.DownloadImageTask
  • Enclosing class:
    MovieDetailsFragment
    public static class MovieDetailsFragment.DownloadImageTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer,​android.graphics.Bitmap>
    This class extends from AsyncTask to allow the execution and download of specifically the image given from the HTTP request from the movie database as a URL. This class allows functions to represent what happens before, during and after the download. Types assigned to AsyncTask go for onPreExecute, doInBackground, onPostExecute, in that exact order.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        android.os.AsyncTask.Status

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        SERIAL_EXECUTOR, THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DownloadImageTask​(android.widget.ImageView movieImage)
      Constructor used to assign a value to an ImageView with the bitmap assigned within this class after download.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected android.graphics.Bitmap doInBackground​(java.lang.String... url)
      This function will run in the background and is the main task for the download.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap getMovieBitmap()
      This function returns the value of the bitmap within this class.
      protected void onPostExecute​(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      This function will execute after doInBackground is complete and will assign the bitmap to the ImageView.
      protected void onPreExecute()
      This function is always completed before the tasks done in this class, and will display the progress dialog.
